title: Dr. Ryan Stowe visit
description: Dr. Ryan Stowe visited the University of Louisville for seminar on April 14th, 2023.

title: University of Nebraska-Lincoln - X-DBER Conference
description: The Balabanoff group attended the X-DBER conference hosted by the University of Nebraska-Lincoln in April 2023. Cas Koevoets-Beach presented a poster on her research investigating STEM students’ self-assessment.

title: UofL Graduate School Regional Research Conference
description: Cas Koevoets-Beach presented a poster at the University of Louisville's Graduate School Regional Research Conference.

title: Western Kentucky University CER Seminar
description: Dr. Morgan Balabanoff visited Western Kentucky University for a seminar

title: Meet the new postdoc
description: Emmanuel Echeverri-Jimenez finished his Ph.D. at North Carolina State University supervised by Dr. Maria Oliver-Hoyo. At NC State, he developed a Virtual Reality Learning Environment to support students' spatial abilities as they extracted, represented, and predicted stereochemical outcomes for the Diels-Alder reaction. At the Balabanoff group, Emmanuel will focus on exploring students' epistemic knowledge in the context of atomic models, and its contrast with corriculum expectations.

title: Southeastern STEM Education Research Conference
description: The Balabanoff Group attended the 2023 Southeastern Science Education Research Conference at Tennessee Tech University. Taylor Humphreys and Karen Julian presented their research at the Undergraduate Summer Research Poster Session. This work was part of the Mentored Undergraduate Research Grant program where both Taylor and Karen were mentored by Cas Koevoets-Beach, who also presented her work at the conference.

title: Murray State University Seminar
description: Dr. Morgan Balabanoff visited Murray State University for a seminar.

title: Step Forward for the Ph.D. Candidate!
description: Cas Koevoets-Beach successfully completed her literature seminar presentation. She presented works focusing on NMR and scaffolding.

title: Dr. Justin Carmel Visit
description: Dr. Justin Carmel for seminar on November 11, 2022. Dr. Carmel presented the talk: 'Investigating Sociocultural and Environmental Factors Related to Students’ Chemistry Identity Development'.

title: 2022 Biennial Conference on Chemical Education
description: The Balabanoff group attended the BCCE at Purdue University where Dr. Balabanoff presented the talk: 'The Water Instrument: Assessment of Fundamental Concepts in General Chemistry'

title: Balabanoff Group Foundation!
description: Dr. Balabanoff founded her Chemistry Education Research Group!
